long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the vibrant joy of Naganohara Fireworks to your screen with this stunning live wallpaper featuring Yoimiya. Her infectious enthusiasm and dazzling display of pyrotechnics capture the festive spirit of summer in Inazuma. Whether you’re a fan of her explosive personality or the stunning artistry of Genshin Impact, this live wallpaper transforms every new tab into a celebration of light and wonder.

Key Features
🎇 Dynamic Fireworks Animation: Watch spectacular fireworks light up the screen in vibrant colors.
🧡 Yoimiya Centerpiece: A captivating design of Yoimiya, glowing with her signature charm and energy.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Integrated for seamless searches.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Functional and beautifully placed to enhance the design.
🔗 Customizable Shortcuts: Add your most-used websites for quick access.
🔗 Extension Management Links: Easily locate “Remove Extension” and “More Extensions” options in the bottom-left corner.

Celebrate the artistry of Yoimiya and the explosive joy of fireworks every time you open a new tab with this must-have live wallpaper for Genshin Impact fans!
